sourcesContent: import { Button, Grid, makeStyles, Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import React from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Navigation from '../components/Navigation' import RelatedProducts from '../components/RelatedProducts' import demo from '../image/demo.gif' const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ container: { width: '90%', marginTop: '20px', margin: '0 auto', height: '80vh', '& img':{ height: '100%', width: '100%' } } })) function SingleProduct() { const classes = useStyles() const product = useSelector( state => state.product.products[0]?.product) const singleProduct = product && product.filter( single => single.slug === product.slug) console.log(singleProduct) return ( <> My Product Rs. 4500 lorem ispsum is a dummy text just to fill the content dummy text just to fill the content dummy text just to fill the content ) } export default SingleProduct
